name: Dor dor
message: Happy birthday Dad! You're my favorite person in the whole world! I love and cherish you so much, and I'm glad we all get to celebrate you on this special day. I know you're going to rock this new age with grace and charm as always. I love you daddy‚ù§. GOD BLESS YOUUUUU!
